page.title: 03NOTTINGHAM-MY RELIGION
page.content: My religion does not allow me to eat meat that is not{"halal".}"Halal" is{specially prepared meat.}At school we have meals which do not contain meat - but we can eat fish. We practise our religion at home and at{the mosque.}The mosque is near our home, in the J.I.P.A.C. centre. My brothers and sisters go to the mosque most days, for 2 hours after school. They go to{learn}to read{the Kuran.} The Kuran is the Muslim bible.At home we{speak}both{Punjabi}and{Urdhu.}The Kuran is written in another language which we are learning to read. I think it will take me a long time before I will understand it. We all have our own{prayer mats}at home. We have to learn many prayers by heart. We should{pray 5 times a day - when we are at school we pray at 5 a.m.,12 noon, 5 p.m., 9 p.m. & 11 p.m.
